title: Last chance to register for your Free VW Camper&Bus Show tickets

posts.content: Thank you to those of you that have contacted me already about having a SSVC display at the VW Camper&Bus Show, Eatnor Castle, Ledbury, 7 -9 August 2015. We still need a couple more splits to make it a proper display. In return for showing your vehicle you get Two free weekend tickets plus a vehicle pass. e mail adrian.vaughan@timeinc.com for more information web site http://www.volksworld.com/camper-and-bus-show you tube preview https://youtu.be/5ipqCLz0ZcU
